scripts.dev: echo 'WARNING: must run `npm run dev:durable_objects` in other window' && npm run build && npx @transformation-dev/wrangler pages dev --binding DEBUG="blueprint:*" --mount transformation-durable_objects=./durable_objects --do COUNTER=Counter@transformation-durable_objects --proxy 3000 -- vite --host
scripts.build: npm run build:version.json && npm run build:durable_objects && npm run build:ui
scripts.start: env BROWSER=none npx @transformation-dev/wrangler pages dev --binding DEBUG="blueprint:*" --mount transformation-durable_objects=./durable_objects --do COUNTER=Counter@transformation-durable_objects --proxy 3001 -- vite preview --host
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.coverage:build: npm run coverage:build:durable_objects && vite build --config vite-coverage.config.js
scripts.coverage:build-and-start: npm run coverage:build && npm run start
scripts.coverage:too-soon-to-report: rm -rf ./.nyc_output ./coverage && start-server-and-test coverage:build-and-start http://localhost:8788 cypress:run && nyc report --reporter=lcov
